items.title: Japan Trip 2026
items.summary: Trip to Japan coming up. Hotels mostly booked. Fountain pen shopping is a key item — looking at stores in Tokyo for Pilot, Sailor, and Platinum. Also planning to pick up pens for siblings.
open_actions: Research Itoya and Maruzen pen floors
Check baggage allowance for liquids/fragile items

items.title: Cerebro
items.summary: Developer insight platform — gives engineers visibility into what's happening across the org. Side project, needs focused time outside work hours. Has been deprioritized but keeps coming back.
open_actions: Set aside dedicated weekly time slot

items.title: Fountain Pen Research
items.heat_reason: time decay (5 days since last mention)
items.summary: Deep dive into fountain pens — comparing Japanese brands (Pilot, Sailor, Platinum). Considering buying in Japan to get better selection and pricing. Also looking at high-quality writing paper.

items.title: Go Game Engine / ECS
items.summary: Golang project building an Entity Component System on top of a Go game engine. Current sticking point is how to register components to entities cleanly.

calendar_events.title: Online Consultation & Diagnosis (Regine Blaise PMHNP)
calendar_events.description:
Client Time zone: America/New_York 

Change Appointment: https://portal.getmindfulhealth.com



Thanks for scheduling an appointment with ✌️Mindful. Set aside 25 minutes for the appointment.

Please check your email for a booking confirmation and next steps to complete the medical intake form. This is required to confirm your appointment.
